content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on my understanding of the market and the size of the apartment, I believe a monthly rental price of 800 Euros would be fair. However, I am open to negotiation and would be willing to consider a higher price if you are willing to pay more. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Thank you for the opportunity to rent your apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. The apartment is in good condition and is located in a desirable neighborhood. I am sure you will enjoy living there. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your help, Mister Heine. I will sign the lease as soon as possible.
Do you have any other apartments available for rent in Mannheim?
Please let me know if you do.
Thank you again.
Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Yes, I do have other apartments available for rent in Mannheim. If you are interested, I can provide you with more information about them. Please let me know if you would like to see any of them or if you have any other questions. I look forward to hearing from you again.
name: Heinrich Heine
